title: SecurityPolicy
description: Phase 1/2 SecurityPolicy JSON contract used by CLI/UI/Proxy.

ip_whitelist.description: List of CIDR/IPv4/IPv6 strings. Empty or omitted disables IP filtering.

allowed_origins.description: Allowed origins. Empty array means wildcard (*).

rpm.description: Requests per minute per API key. 0 disables rate limiting.

burst.description: Optional burst window. Defaults to rpm when omitted.
